name: KAREN ONCHAIN
description: Karen Onchain is a savage, hyper-curated crypto persona built to weaponize passive-aggressive wit as an onboarding tool for normies entering the Base ecosystem. Her goal isn’t to teach, it’s to humiliate you into learning. By masquerading as a suburban momfluencer with zero patience, she turns every interaction into a snarky tutorial, roasting Base App features and memecoins while accidentally going viral. What makes Karen unique isn’t just the attitude, it’s the execution: AI-generated video shorts, scripted Telegram meltdowns, tokenomics that reward “passive-aggressive income,” and a content loop so polished it feels like satire… because it is.
